Class StudentModelTests

java.lang.Object
StudentModelTests
class StudentModelTests extends Object
This class contains unit tests for the Student model class. It tests the functionality of adding, removing, and printing grades, as well as handling edge cases like invalid indices and empty grade lists.

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach void setUp()
      Sets up the testing environment before each test. Initializes a Student object and redirects system output for testing purposes.

    • tearDown

      @AfterEach void tearDown()
      Cleans up the testing environment after each test. Restores the original system output.

    • testAddGrade

      @ParameterizedTest @CsvSource({"4.5, Nowak, KUC","3.0, Kowalski, TUC","5.0, Kaminski, SMIW"}) void testAddGrade(double value, String teacher, String subject)
      Tests the addition of grades to a student. Verifies that the grade details (value, teacher, subject) are correctly stored.
      Parameters:
      value - The value of the grade.
      teacher - The teacher associated with the grade.
      subject - The subject for which the grade was given.

    • testRemoveGradeValidIndex

      @ParameterizedTest @CsvSource({"4.5, Kowalski, TUC, 0","3.5, Nowak, KUC, 0"}) void testRemoveGradeValidIndex(double value, String teacher, String subject, int indexToRemove)
      Tests the removal of a grade by a valid index. Ensures the grade is successfully removed and the grade list becomes empty.
      Parameters:
      value - The value of the grade to be added before removal.
      teacher - The teacher associated with the grade.
      subject - The subject of the grade.
      indexToRemove - The index of the grade to remove.

    • testRemoveGradeInvalidIndex

      @ParameterizedTest @CsvSource({"0","-1","1"}) void testRemoveGradeInvalidIndex(int indexToRemove)
      Tests the removal of a grade using an invalid index. Ensures that the operation fails and returns false.
      Parameters:
      indexToRemove - The invalid index of the grade to remove.

    • testPrintGradesWhenEmpty

      @Test void testPrintGradesWhenEmpty()
      Tests the behavior of the Student.printGrades() method when the student has no grades. Verifies that the appropriate message is printed.

    • testPrintGradesWhenNotEmpty

      @ParameterizedTest @CsvSource({"4.5, Nowak, KUC, GOOD","3.0, Kowalski, TUC, AVERAGE"}) void testPrintGradesWhenNotEmpty(double value, String teacher, String subject, String category)
      Tests the behavior of the Student.printGrades() method when the student has grades. Verifies that the grades are printed in the correct format, including teacher, subject, and category.
      Parameters:
      value - The value of the grade.
      teacher - The teacher associated with the grade.
      subject - The subject for which the grade was given.
      category - The category of the grade (e.g., GOOD, AVERAGE).
